headline: Is Bristol Myers Squibb (BMY) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Share Price Climb
summary: If you are wondering whether Bristol-Myers Squibb is offering good value right now, this article will walk through what the current share price could mean for long term investors. The stock last closed at US$62.37, with returns of 2.8% over 7 days, 14.9% over 30 days, 16.7% year to date, 9.9% over 1 year, 3.2% over 3 years, and 25.9% over 5 years. Recent news coverage has continued to focus on Bristol-Myers Squibb as a major player in large cap pharmaceuticals, including ongoing attention on...
